about_the_game:
Take on the role of managing a group of wizards who have arrived in a new world. Start by managing one planet. Build buildings, assign people to industries. Build more buildings. Capture nearby planets and expand your influence.

  • More than 100 planets (randomly generated)
  • 80 types of research (20 for each element)
  • More than 40 different buildings
  • A limited field of 15x11 cells to build on each planet
  • 6 types of military units (spirits)
  • More than 30 types of resources (including people)
detailed_description:
Take on the role of managing a group of wizards who have arrived in a new world. Start by managing one planet. Build buildings, assign people to industries. Build more buildings. Capture nearby planets and expand your influence.

  • More than 100 planets (randomly generated)
  • 80 types of research (20 for each element)
  • More than 40 different buildings
  • A limited field of 15x11 cells to build on each planet
  • 6 types of military units (spirits)
  • More than 30 types of resources (including people)
name: Elemental Empire Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: An economic 4x strategy in a space filled with magic and procedurally generated planets. Build your own empire and become the sole ruler of a new world.
